price: 91. Toen wendde hij zich tot hun valse goden en zei: “Eten jullie niet?
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
